name: Filetype toggling
description: Allows user to choose between downloading CSV and RDF file (all supported serializations)

name: Spreadsheet interface
description: Allows to perform tabular transformations directly on the preview table

name: Advanced file upload
description: Allows to upload shapefiles, excel files, various delimiter-separated files

name: Data audit
description: Feature to enable data audit (outliers, spelling check, schema)
